mapper.insert: insert into goods (gdsNum, gdsName, cateCode, gdsPrice, gdsStock, gdsDes) values (goods_seq.nextval, #{gdsName}, #{cateCode}, #{gdsPrice}, #{gdsStock}, #{gdsDes})
mapper.select: select gdsNum, gdsName, cateCode, gdsPrice, gdsStock, gdsDes, gdsImg, gdsDate from Goods order by gdsNum desc

select g.gdsNum, g.gdsName, g.cateCode, c.cateCodeRef, c.cateName, gdsPrice, gdsStock, gdsDes, gdsImg, gdsDate from goods g inner join goods_category c on g.cateCode = c.cateCode where g.gdsNum = #{gdsNum}
mapper.update: update goods set gdsName = #{gdsName}, cateCode = #{cateCode}, gdsPrice = #{gdsPrice}, gdsStock = #{gdsStock}, gdsDes = #{gdsDes} where gdsNum = #{gdsNum}
